name: Dried Red Chilli
description: Dry red chili is a condiment that adds pungency and color to the food.

name: Cardamom
description: Cardamom is an herb that is often used as a spice in foods.

description: Rampatri is an aromatic spice similar to mace but much denser and aromatic.

name: Coriander

description: Curry leaves are a part of a small deciduous aromatic shrub.

name: Cumin Seeds
description: Cumin seed is used as a spice for its distinctive flavor and aroma.

name: Hing Asefoetida
description: Asafoetida is an remedy for bloating and other stomach problems like flatulence.

name: Ginger
